review: Have had this one month, so far so good.***Pros***-Can side load xbmc/spmc-Can load Plex-Using it wireless- Have never had a buffering issue unless also streaming to another tv on Netflix or hulu (bandwidth issue not FireTV)- Video is in HD with no buffering issues-Remote control works well-Also using wireless Keyboard***Cons***-No access to external storage from USB (FireTV is 5GB)-I dont think it came with an HDMI Cable.-Remote will not control volume without other modifications-Should be able to add any app installed to the recent list without having to use Llama to "trick" it into doing so.With that said, this is a great device and with the few negatives I plan on buying at least 1 more for another TV. I would like to see the USB give access to an external HD without having to do more to the device. Though XBMC and PLEX allow this through their setup.
